data.similar:
Various Content Management Systems (including Slashcode, Scoop, and
    Everything), but these are far more complex than QuickCMS.
    HTML::Mason is somewhat similar in spirit, though is also more
    complex.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SSIs have a design flaw that forces you towards either redundancy
    or unmaintainability (often both). This is because each individual
    document must pull in the included file on its own. QuickCMS takes
    the opposite approach. Using HTML::Template, mod_perl, and a
    POD-like document syntax, QuickCMS fills in the individual documents
    into a template.
